description:
Registered vacancies

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
13211 Labour market statistics of the Federal Employment
Agency

Definition:
The registered vacancies are:
- jobs subject to social insurance contributions, or
- marginal employment (mini-jobs), or
- other jobs (e.g. internships, traineeships).
The jobs must be intended for a duration of more than seven
calendar days and must have been reported to joint
institutions of the employment agencies and job centres as
vacancies to be filled.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Registered vacancies
